conclusion: Determine the distance from the particle's launch position to point P using mechanics and electromagnetism principles.
Identify given information: particle mass m, charge q, electric field strength E, magnetic induction strength B, angle 60 degrees, velocity v0, launch position P, exit position Q and N.
Particle is launched horizontally to the right with velocity v0, enters magnetic field at point P, exits between lower edges Q and N, does not collide with baffles.
Analyze particle's motion using equations of motion for a particle in a magnetic field.
Magnetic force on particle is F = qvB, electric force is F = qE, net force is sum of electric and magnetic forces, acceleration is a = F/m.
